price: 安拉要使谁迷误，谁没有向导，并任随他们彷徨于残暴之中。
arabic: مَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَا هَادِيَ لَهُۥۚ وَيَذَرُهُمۡ فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: man yuḍ'lili al-lahu falā hādiya lahu wayadharuhum fī ṭugh'yānihim yaʿmahūna
